can

Ye=
s it falls under the banner of "evolutionary computation," which 
includes =
"genetic algorithms," and more 
specifically, "neuroevolution," which means=
 evolving neural networks 
with evolutionary algorithms.  Much work has bee=
n done in 
evolutionary computation in the last 40 years.  Most of these te=
rms 
appear in Wikipedia, if you want to see more.

ken
